entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:53 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
